title: Brand Designer, Google Cloud, Marketing
description: Google Cloud Brand and Creative is a team of creative thinkers and makers...
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 5 years of experience working in a creative discipline (e.g., design). Experience with standard industry design tools and software (e.g., Figma, Adobe Creative suite and other design tools). A portfolio of creative work.
preferred_qualifications: Experience collaborating with specialists like vendors, agencies, creative talents, etc. Knowledge of contemporary design and technology trends and insightful ways on how these could be relevant to brand expression. Understanding of how to design for the modern web across browsers, screen sizes, and user profiles. Understanding of motion design. Ability to create design systems, interactive design (web) and graphic design (e.g., typography, layout, and how it extends across digital and traditional mediums).
responsibilities: Create original design systems to provide brand consistency across many assets from banners to Out of Home (OOH), digital to physical experiences. Be able to present your work, articulate clear direction, and develop prioritized action items. Provide design solutions to address changing brand needs. Take care of the big picture design as you do for the smallest details. Ensure your designs are grounded in conceptual and strategic thinking.
